body: Ogres with the thicken template have huge, oversized heads and razor-sharp teeth.
name: Thicken (CR +0)

sections.body: –1 to AC, ranged attack rolls, initiative, and Dexterity-based skills; gains a bite attack (1d8).
sections.name: Quick Rules

sections.body: Ability Scores –2 Dexterity; Attacks gains a bite attack (1d8) .
sections.name: Rebuild Rules
